pull.title: build: update retry to current version
pull.body:
This commit eliminates spelling and white space
errors that are flagged in the linting process

events.body: Please specify the commit hash of the "current version", see e.g. fa0aac0f43a108a88b03a346464ecda4ae2cf630
Also, travis doesn't pass because you introduced trailing whitespace
